name: Succubus Puttel
description:
The hero who lost his parents by an incubus lives with his sister.

One day, I hear rumors that there is a big party in a distant castle,
Shortly thereafter, my sister disappeared.
At the same time, a large number of demons appear in various places and begin to kidnap the humans they find as bait ...
The hero who is left alone goes on the road to confront the devil in order to find his sister.

If you lose to the same incubus twice more, you will enter the defeat ending for each character ...!
All are female on top posture, breast play (titty fuck, puff puff, breastfeeding handjob ... etc) centered!

★ Difficulty that can be selected at any time during the game!
